verbose_text: During hospitalization, the risk factors for DVT were assessed through clinical data : 1) clinical risk factors, including surgery, stroke history, diabetes history, hyperlipidemia, and bedtime; 2) patient related risk factors, including age, infusion history, body temperature, blood pressure, smoking history, and oral medication; 3) hypercoagulable markers, including D-dimer, red blood cells, platelets, and plasma fibrinogen levels.
